title: 25 SEFM | SEPR 20
content: Contribution to the 9th Joint Congress of the Spanish Society of Medical Physics (SEFM) and the Spanish Society of Radiological Protection (SEPR) (25 SEFM SEPR 20), held on May 27-30, 2025, in the El Greco Conference Center of Toledo, Spain. A poster titled "Enhancing traceability in radiation protection dosimetry" was presented.

title: ERPW 2024
content: Contribution to the European Radiation Protection Week 2024 (ERPW 2024), held on November 11-15, 2024, in the Aurelia Auditorium Congress Center in Rome, Italy. An oral presentation titled "Implications of the realization of characterised reference radiation fields in a primary standards dosimertry laboratory" was given in the "Planned and existing exposure of workers due to artificial radiation in normal operational condition" (see the Book of abstracts).

title: IRPA 16 HPS
content: Contribution to the 16th International Congress of the International Radiation Protection Association (IRPA 16 HPS), held in Orlando, Florida. A poster was presented at the conference (see also the contribution abstract).

title: 28th IJCIEOM
content: Contribution to the 28th International Joint Conference on Industrial Engineering and Operations Management (IJCIEOM 2024), held in Salvador, Brazil. An oral presentation was given in the Healthcare Management section. A peer-reviewed publication is included in the conference proceedings.

title: RAP 2024
content: Two contributions to the International Conference on Radiation Applications in Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Medical Sciences, Engineering and Environmental Sciences (RAP 24) held in Granada, Spain. An oral presentation and a poster were presented at the conference (see the Book of abstracts).

title: 75th Anniversary Conference of the Vinča Institute
content: Contribution to the scientific conference 75 Years of Science, Technology, and Innovation at the Vinča Institute (75 godina nauke, tehnologije i inovacija u Institutu Vinča), held on January 30 and 31, 2024, in the Grand Hall of the University of Belgrade Rectorate. An oral presentation titled "Dosimetry and Metrology of Ionizing Radiation" ("Dozimetrija i metrologija jonizujućeg zračenja") was given at the conference.

title: CS LNE 2023
content: Contribution to the Annual Meeting of the French Metrology Network for ionizing radiation, held in Cadarache, France, in November 2023. An oral presentation was given at the conference.

title: 44 DRO 2023
content: Two contributions to the 44th Radiation Protection Days annual meeting (44 DRO), held in Tábor, Czechia. An oral presentation and a poster were presented at the conference (see the Book of abstracts).

title: ICDA-4
content: Contribution to the 4th International Conference on Dosimetry and its Applications (ICDA-4), held in Valencia, Spain. A poster was presented in the Individual Dosimetry and Monitoring section (see the Book of abstracts).

title: ERPW 2023
content: Contribution to the 7th European Radiation Protection Week (ERPW 2023), held in Dublin, Ireland. A poster was presented in the Occupational Radiation Protection section (see the Book of abstracts).

title: AIRP 2023
content: Contribution to the National Conference of AIRP on Radioprotection, held in Cagliari, Italy. An oral presentation and two posters (see them here and here) were presented in the Dosimetry/Measurement Methods section (see the Scientific Program).
